title: Further Than The Planes Fly
lyrics:
Shoot, shoot, shoot
You have what I need
Put me in a rocket, send me into the sky
Further than the planes fly (planes fly)
Shoot, shoot, shoot
You are all I need

(All I need)



When we're being ourselves

I forget who we know

We're more than just for show

And we hide from the party

Shiver with cold

I shiver 'cause I'm so, so, so thrown



Shoot, shoot, shoot

You have what I need

Put me in a rocket, send me into the sky

Further than the planes fly (planes fly)

Shoot, shoot, shoot

You are all I need

(All I need)



But, when my fingers creep forward

To touch you for the first time

Well, I don't care who knows

I'll reassess my friendships

I'll let the fake ones go

So it's just us when we're, we're, we're, we're alone



Shoot, shoot, shoot

I'm so bored of all the talking

Put me in a rocket, send me into the sky

Further than the planes fly (planes fly)

Shoot, shoot, shoot

You are all I need

(All I need)

All I need



Shoot, shoot, shoot

I'm so bored of all the talking

Put me in a rocket, send me into the sky

Further than the planes fly (planes fly)

Shoot, shoot, shoot

You are all I need

(All I need)

All I need

(All I need)
